title: [docs] should explain `num_directions` in the RNN and LSTM docstrings
body_html: Right now num_directions is used extensively in the documentation without any actual explanation for what it means. (See https://pytorch.org/docs/stable/nn.html#torch.nn.RNN) I'm assuming that this means 1 by default, and 2 for bidirectional models. But this is not explained anywhere, and I can't even be sure that it's correct.
